actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to retroactive determination of eligibility for disability compensation from the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude certain military retirement pay from gross income when such pay is essentially equivalent to a veteran's disability pension which is excludable.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to retroactive determination of eligibility for disability compensation from the Veterans' Administration.
